name: Milk Tanker Transport
description:
Put your hand on the ignition key and start the heavy duty farm milk tanker truck engine. Drive the powerful 6x6 machine & enjoy the dairy cargo truck driving experience & face the off road mountain traffic. Have you ever thought of waking up near dairy farm and drinking fresh milk? As compared to other tractor farming simulator games, this game 2017 is going to provide you the opportunity to take fresh milk from dairy farm and perform hill transport duty. Let’s play the farming milk truck transporter truck game that has real heavy tanker driving skills to control heavy duty trailer on off road tracks.

Features
Realistic 3D milk cargo tanks
Exciting Levels to Enjoy Milk Tanker Transport
Find parking area and park your truck appropriately
Different camera angles to view all the surroundings of the tanker.
Super powerful front and back gears to move to and fro.
